turkish_example_sentence: O yeşil bahçeli büyük villaya sahip olmuş olsaydı, ailesini davet ederdi
english_example_sentence: If he had had the big villa with green garden, he would have invited his family
russian_example_sentence: Если бы он имел большую виллу с зеленым садом, он бы пригласил свою семью
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O yeşil bahçeli büyük villaya ______, ailesini davet ederdi
